name: Paginator
description: Paginator is a generic component to display content in paged format.

rows.label: rows
rows.title: Data count to display per page.

first.label: first
first.title: Zero-relative number of the first row to be displayed.

page-link-size.label: pageLinkSize
page-link-size.title: Number of page links to display.

rows-per-page-options.label: rowsPerPageOptions
rows-per-page-options.title: Array of integer values to display inside rows per page dropdown.

template.label: template
template.title: Template of the paginator.
template.default: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink RowsPerPageDropdown

current-page-report-template.label: currentPageReportTemplate
current-page-report-template.title: Template of the current page report element. Available placeholders are {currentPage},{totalPages},{rows},{first},{last} and {totalRecords}

always-show.label: alwaysShow
always-show.title: Whether to show the paginator even there is only one page.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: start
slots.title: Custom content for the component's left side.

slots.name: end
slots.title: Custom content for the component's right side.

slots.name: firstpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom first page link icon template.

slots.name: prevpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom previous page link icon template.

slots.name: nextpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom next page link icon template.

slots.name: lastpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom last page link icon template.

events.name: page
events.title: Callback to invoke when page changes, the event object contains information about the new state.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page
